contents.value: Please use https://valor-software.com/ngx-bootstrap/#/tabs to make the tab design above
Please use json Data to power the whole UI. Do not hardcode any values in HTML
You are free to use any json structure you want o tuse to power the UI. Keep in mind the efficiency and performance
Please feel free to use colors you like, and eyeball the padding and margins, don't have to be exact for dimentions
In general please make sure the application is responseive - Don't worry about mobile phones
Please use Google fonts - Nunito in this application and incloude them in the application and do not use the https link directly
For icons please use FontAwesome Icons
Please use https://www.npmjs.com/package/ngx-echarts to render any chart you want
The chart should be in the form of a component which you will use here when you select the tab 2
Please use, javascript functions like filter or map or reduce to get the data for the charts
